channel.title: Coding
channel.description:
i got a problem i hope if its ok to ask
i got a problem with coding a server many of you are wondering how to code your server like wise adding new items like d claws and stuff well im asking now how do i code my server?
please teach me how please and thank you. :) ;) :o ;D

item.title: Coding
item.dc:creator: @devil_child devil child
item.description:

yaya i heard what first guy said lol thanks you guys thanks for yo help i apricete it

Read full topic

item.title: Coding
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Rich Dude99, post:4, topic:265823”][font=Century Gothic]Hiya,

When you say “New Items” thats coding a client. I suggest you visit: Client Section for more information on RS2 Clients, and as Darkning said Tutorials Section for some basic help starting a server. If you want, getting some basic background knowledge on Java to help you understand how the coding system works very well.

Overall have fun here, and we as a community are here to help you on your way to creating a server, and learning Java as you do it.

-Rich Dude99[/font][/quote]
Rich Dude99 is right. The more you know java, the easier you’ll be able to make and modify your server, and more “uniqueness” you’ll have. Just check the tutorials in these sections and you’ll do fine =)

Read full topic

item.title: Coding
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

[font=Century Gothic]Hiya,

When you say “New Items” thats coding a client. I suggest you visit: Client Section for more information on RS2 Clients, and as Darkning said Tutorials Section for some basic help starting a server. If you want, getting some basic background knowledge on Java to help you understand how the coding system works very well.

Overall have fun here, and we as a community are here to help you on your way to creating a server, and learning Java as you do it.

-Rich Dude99[/font]

Read full topic
